verses.text: “\w You|strong="H6213"\w* \w are|strong="H4639"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w construct|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w* \w itself|strong="H6213"\w* \w with|strong="H6213"\w* \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w curtains|strong="H3407"\w* \w of|strong="H4639"\w* \w finely|strong="H8336"\w* spun \w linen|strong="H8336"\w*, each \w with|strong="H6213"\w* \w blue|strong="H8504"\w*, \w purple|strong="H8504"\w*, \w and|strong="H8504"\w* \w scarlet|strong="H8144"\w* \w yarn|strong="H8144"\w*, \w and|strong="H8504"\w* \w cherubim|strong="H3742"\w* skillfully \w worked|strong="H6213"\w* \w into|strong="H6213"\w* \w them|strong="H6213"\w*.

The Eleven Curtains of Goat Hair (Exodus 36:14–19)

\w You|strong="H5921"\w* \w are|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w curtains|strong="H3407"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w goat|strong="H5795"\w* hair \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w tent|strong="H3407"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w*—\w eleven|strong="H6249"\w* \w curtains|strong="H3407"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H6213"\w*.

Each \w of|strong="H7341"\w* \w the|strong="H4060"\w* \w eleven|strong="H6249"\w* \w curtains|strong="H3407"\w* is \w to|strong="H3407"\w* \w be|strong="H7970"\w* \w the|strong="H4060"\w* same \w size|strong="H4060"\w*—\w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* cubits long \w and|strong="H7970"\w* four cubits \w wide|strong="H7341"\w*.\f + \fr 26:8 \ft Each of the eleven curtains was approximately 45 feet long and 6 feet wide (13.7 meters long and 1.8 meters wide).\f*

\w Join|strong="H2266"\w* \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w curtains|strong="H3407"\w* into \w one|strong="H2266"\w* set \w and|strong="H2568"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* other \w six|strong="H8337"\w* into \w another|strong="H6440"\w*. Then fold \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w sixth|strong="H8345"\w* \w curtain|strong="H3407"\w* \w over|strong="H6440"\w* \w double|strong="H3717"\w* \w at|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w front|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w tent|strong="H3407"\w*.

\w And|strong="H2088"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w tent|strong="H3407"\w* \w curtains|strong="H3407"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* cubit \f + \fr 26:13 \ft A cubit is approximately 18 inches or 45.7 centimeters.\f* longer \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w either|strong="H2088"\w* \w side|strong="H6654"\w*, \w and|strong="H2088"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w excess|strong="H5736"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w hang|strong="H5628"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w sides|strong="H6654"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w cover|strong="H3680"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w Also|strong="H6213"\w* \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w covering|strong="H4372"\w* \w for|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* tent \w out|strong="H6213"\w* \w of|strong="H4372"\w* ram \w skins|strong="H5785"\w* \w dyed|strong="H5785"\w* red, \w and|strong="H6213"\w* \w over|strong="H4605"\w* \w that|strong="H6213"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w covering|strong="H4372"\w* \w of|strong="H4372"\w* \w fine|strong="H8476"\w* \w leather|strong="H5785"\w*.\f + \fr 26:14 \ft Possibly the hides of large aquatic mammals\f* The Frames and Bases (Exodus 36:20–34)

\w You|strong="H6213"\w* \w are|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w construct|strong="H6213"\w* \w upright|strong="H5975"\w* \w frames|strong="H7175"\w* \w of|strong="H6086"\w* \w acacia|strong="H7848"\w* \w wood|strong="H6086"\w* \w for|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w*.

\w Each|strong="H7175"\w* \w frame|strong="H7175"\w* is \w to|strong="H6235"\w* be \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* cubits long \w and|strong="H7341"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* cubit \w and|strong="H7341"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w half|strong="H2677"\w* \w wide|strong="H7341"\w*.\f + \fr 26:16 \ft Each frame was approximately 15 feet long and 2.25 feet wide (4.6 meters long and 68.6 centimeters wide).\f*

\w Two|strong="H8147"\w* \w tenons|strong="H3027"\w* \f + \fr 26:17 \ft That is, projecting pieces of wood made for insertion into another piece; similarly in verse 19.\f* must \w be|strong="H3027"\w* connected \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w each|strong="H3605"\w* \w other|strong="H8147"\w* \w for|strong="H6213"\w* \w each|strong="H3605"\w* \w frame|strong="H7175"\w*. \w Make|strong="H6213"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w frames|strong="H7175"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w* \w in|strong="H6213"\w* \w this|strong="H3651"\w* \w way|strong="H3651"\w*.

\w Construct|strong="H6213"\w* \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w frames|strong="H7175"\w* \w for|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w south|strong="H5045"\w* \w side|strong="H6285"\w* \w of|strong="H5045"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w*,

\w with|strong="H6213"\w* forty \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* bases \w under|strong="H8478"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w frames|strong="H7175"\w*—\w two|strong="H8147"\w* bases \w for|strong="H6213"\w* \w each|strong="H8147"\w* \w frame|strong="H7175"\w*, \w one|strong="H6213"\w* \w under|strong="H8478"\w* \w each|strong="H8147"\w* tenon.

\w For|strong="H4908"\w* \w the|strong="H8145"\w* \w second|strong="H8145"\w* \w side|strong="H6285"\w* \w of|strong="H4908"\w* \w the|strong="H8145"\w* \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w*, \w the|strong="H8145"\w* \w north|strong="H6828"\w* \w side|strong="H6285"\w*, make \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w frames|strong="H7175"\w*
\w and|strong="H3701"\w* forty \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* bases—\w two|strong="H8147"\w* bases \w under|strong="H8478"\w* \w each|strong="H8147"\w* \w frame|strong="H7175"\w*.

\w Make|strong="H6213"\w* \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w frames|strong="H7175"\w* \w for|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w rear|strong="H3411"\w* \w of|strong="H3220"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w*, \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w west|strong="H3220"\w* \w side|strong="H3220"\w*,

\w So|strong="H1961"\w* \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w are|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w eight|strong="H8083"\w* \w frames|strong="H7175"\w* \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w sixteen|strong="H8337"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* bases—\w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w under|strong="H8478"\w* \w each|strong="H8147"\w* \w frame|strong="H7175"\w*.

\w The|strong="H8432"\w* central crossbar \w in|strong="H8432"\w* \w the|strong="H8432"\w* \w middle|strong="H8432"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H8432"\w* \w frames|strong="H7175"\w* \w shall|strong="H7175"\w* extend \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w one|strong="H4480"\w* \w end|strong="H7097"\w* \w to|strong="H1272"\w* \w the|strong="H8432"\w* \w other|strong="H7097"\w*.

\w So|strong="H6965"\w* \w you|strong="H7200"\w* \w are|strong="H4941"\w* \w to|strong="H6965"\w* \w set|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w* \w according|strong="H4941"\w* \w to|strong="H6965"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* pattern \w shown|strong="H7200"\w* \w you|strong="H7200"\w* \w on|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w*. The Veil (Exodus 36:35–36)

\w Make|strong="H6213"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w veil|strong="H6532"\w* \w of|strong="H4639"\w* \w blue|strong="H8504"\w*, \w purple|strong="H8504"\w*, \w and|strong="H8504"\w* \w scarlet|strong="H8144"\w* \w yarn|strong="H8144"\w*, \w and|strong="H8504"\w* \w finely|strong="H8336"\w* spun \w linen|strong="H8336"\w*, \w with|strong="H6213"\w* \w cherubim|strong="H3742"\w* skillfully \w worked|strong="H6213"\w* \w into|strong="H6213"\w* \w it|strong="H6213"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1004"\w* \w hang|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w veil|strong="H6532"\w* \w from|strong="H8478"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w clasps|strong="H7165"\w* \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w place|strong="H8478"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* ark \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w Testimony|strong="H5715"\w* \f + \fr 26:33 \ft That is, the ark of the covenant; also in verse 34\f* behind \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w veil|strong="H6532"\w*. \w So|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w veil|strong="H6532"\w* \w will|strong="H1004"\w* separate \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w Holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w Place|strong="H8478"\w* \w from|strong="H8478"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w Most|strong="H6944"\w* \w Holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w Place|strong="H8478"\w*.\f + \fr 26:33 \ft Or the Holy of Holies; also in verse 34\f*

\w For|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w entrance|strong="H6607"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* tent, \w you|strong="H6213"\w* \w are|strong="H4639"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w curtain|strong="H4539"\w* embroidered \w with|strong="H6213"\w* \w blue|strong="H8504"\w*, \w purple|strong="H8504"\w*, \w and|strong="H8504"\w* \w scarlet|strong="H8144"\w* \w yarn|strong="H8144"\w*, \w and|strong="H8504"\w* \w finely|strong="H8336"\w* spun \w linen|strong="H8336"\w*.
